Polynomial.summary: The Polynomial class. Contains overloaded operators to operate on polynomials with one variable.

Constants.value: Gets the list of constants of the current polynomial.

Exponent.value: Gets the exponent of the current polynomial.

Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Polynomial class with the specified exponent and constants.

Negate.summary: Negates the specified polynomial. The new polynomial has the same exponent, but constants are with the opposite signs.

Subtract.param: The polynomial from which is subtracted.

MultiplyDoublePolynomial.summary: Multiplies the specified polynomial by the specified scalar.

MultiplyPolynomialPolynomial.returns: The new polynomial as a result of multiplying and .
